findings.details: Set blog list CTA buttons to full width on small screens for easier tapping and alignment.
Manual scan found no placeholder/example.com links in posts/pages. External URLs not live-checked in offline audit.
Key pages include title/description/keywords, and layout includes seo tag and structured data.
Blog summaries are clamped for consistency; CTA sizing refined for mobile UX.

recommendations: Continue monitoring external links with an online checker when network access is available.
Consider adding lightweight CTA emphasis on the homepage blog cards to match mobile tap target improvements.
